articles.description: Miley Cyrus has released her comeback track ‘Flowers’ which samples Bruno Mars’ 2011 hit ‘When I Was Your Man’ - and some fans think it was penned about her romance with Liam Hemsworth.

articles.title: Kate Garraway says husband Derek Draper fell out of wheelchair after forced to get taxi to hospital - Derbyshire Live
